class.name: UtilityAIBTPassBy
class.brief_description: Runs a user-defined [code]tick()[/code] method without returning any result value.
class.description: The PassBy node can be used to run a user-defined [code]tick()[/code] method without returning any result value. The purpose of this node is to allow running any additional logic during a [code]tick()[/code] without affecting the flow of the Behaviour Tree. In essence, the functionality is similar to the [UtilityAIPassThrough] node, but this node can be placed within a sequence, for example.
